comment.author: Amber
comment.text: So sad you and the President support this con artist. If the shoe was on the other foot, Trump wouldn't even be in this election.

replies.author: Brock
replies.text: Agreed! Her security clearance should be stripped ASAP. http://www.realclearpolitics.com/video/2016/11/02/fbi_sources_tell_fox_news_indictment_likely_in_clinton_foundation_case.html
